952560.name: The Testing Floor
952560.description:
Take control of the C.U.B.E.R and teleport through this puzzle-filled world… Even with the C.U.B.E.R and all its abilities at your disposal, solving the floors that lay in front of you will be no easy task. What starts as a simplistic puzzler, grows into an equation not easily solvable. A seemingly endless number of floors lay between you and the final exit... Can you pass The Testing Floor?

Features

• Unique physics-based teleportation system and Power Cube abilities

• Over 80+ (actually 150+) puzzle-filled floors to solve

• Immersive text-based story

• Fantastic soundtrack to jam to

Developer Letter

Life took over there for a bit but I am back to working on TTF and it is nearly complete. For those that have wishlisted and waited all this time, thank you for your continued support! The game turned out to be far more than "80+ puzzle-filled floors," in fact it is closer to 160 total levels. Sorry it took so long....and sorry it might be one of the most difficult games out there.... if someone out there actually beats this game, I would like to hear from you...you'll know how to reach me.
